 1994-05201994-03-240,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO
PrecisOrder authorizing the Clerk of the Privy Council to make ex gratia payments in order to offset some of the legal expenses incurred by intervenors as a result of their participation in the Commission of Inquiry on the Blood System in Canada, as recommended by the Chairman, the Honourable Mr. Justice Horace Krever.
Attachments
